body:
Looks like #9255 added the wrong checksum, see:
```console
$ md5sum var/spack/cache/rdma-core/rdma-core-17.1.tar.gz 
1d19caf554f815990af5c21356ac4d3a  var/spack/cache/rdma-core/rdma-core-17.1.tar.gz
$ sha256sum var/spack/cache/rdma-core/rdma-core-17.1.tar.gz 
b47444b7c05d3906deb8771eec3e634984dd83f5e620d5e37d3a83f74f0cc1ba  var/spack/cache/rdma-core/rdma-core-17.1.tar.gz
```
title: rdma-core: Fix checksum for @17.1
